title: Harry Styles drops new single Lights Up and no one was prepared
text:
Harry Styles has sent everyone into meltdown by dropping some highly-anticipated new music.

This is not a drill, guys.

The Sign Of The Times hitmaker announced the new track (which is already a certified bop) by simply tweeting: ‘LIGHTS UP. Out now.’

Hazza, who exactly gave you permission?!

Understandably, fans couldn’t handle the news.

We weren’t prepared (Picture: Twitter/Harry_Styles)

‘YEEES, END US!!!’ one tweeted.

‘YOU REALLY PULLED A DRAG ME DOWN,’ another pointed out.

Meanwhile, one more excited fan summed up everyone’s feelings by saying: ‘IM SO PROUD OF YOU THE SINGLE IS INCREDIBLE THE MUSIC VIDEO IS INCREDIBLE IM SO INLOVE WITH EVERYTHING.’

No lies detected.

The 25-year-old has been working on his new album for around a year, revealing in November last year that it was coming. The former One Direction star said: ‘I’m making my second album right now, so I’m going to do that [make the right choices], read a lot and see what happens.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

And he’s since been teasing it, with Stevie Nicks previously telling The Face magazine that the new record is ‘not like his last album’.

‘It’s not like anything One Direction ever did. It’s pure Harry, as Harry would say. He’s made a very different record and it’s spectacular,’ she said.

Harry’s been working on his new album for about a year (Picture: Getty Images)

Harry added: ‘I’m not always super-outspoken. But I think it’s very clear from choices that I make that I feel a certain way about lots of things.

‘I don’t know how to describe it. I guess I’m not… I want everyone to feel welcome at shows and online. They want to be loved and equal, you know?

‘I’m never unsupported, so it feels weird for me to overthink it for someone else.’

Meanwhile, fans went into utter meltdown when the star tweeted a cryptic message after being away from social media for five months, simply telling us all ‘Do.’

Come again?

Safe to say, the world was more than ready for some more Styles.
